content.text: When talking about Laws & Regulations it is necessary to mention the fact that aspects of them vary around the World. Every country, every state, and every city may decide differently when it comes to keeping their population safe. Because of that, is the same people who are protected by the law, the ones that must know what obligations and responsibilities they have towards the place they live in and the people they share it with.

content.text: In the end, laws are there to protect us. They could help us when having difficulties at our job when traveling, while driving, or even if we are victims of robbery or violence, and more.
